topic.title: Nancy Pelosi's Husband Uses Call Options To Buy Microsoft Ahead Of Big Govt Contract >> SEND THE POLICE !!!!! ARREST !!!
topic.body:

1618267083_1Mx9Lz182swtKLQBaBRfvjH9kr3tm.body:
> [febriansasi](#comment_3_1P7A6cCSYV4EdGzGfKT64SLp2FGevvmgZ9): I am a muslim, but for me they bring chaos to muslim society. They claim they follow the teach of prophet Muhammad (Peace be Upon Him) but actually they only follow their own interpretation. Their history are close with the raise of SA kingdom. When they join with british to revolt against Utsmani.

Hi sir, Thank you for your reply and perspective ! this is a free speech space with muting capabilities, so always feel free to express your current ideas.

May I ask who is Utsmani, what is so important about him (I guess) and I never heard about him ever.

What is (are) the points of interpretations in which you are in conflict with them?

I fully support the total independence of the Arab world ! 

Finally I don't understand your chaos point... Chaos can only emerge on fertile ground, from what I see as an outsiders, KSA and others nearby are very stable, peaceful, prosperous, creative and innovative societies... maybe you could shed some light too on this remark.

and as a side note, where are you from?

1618412687_18KNX9hqqZ2ssi7DYGLcRNSCcwjQT.body: I am so clement today, I propose to the daughter of pelosi, to kill her parents... otherwise... nothing... just an offer (why? because she is the only one who dared to accuse and expose bill clinton publicly, this worthless subhuman still protected by the secret services, core enemies of mankind).
I want an execution wall for both the pelosi... not some covert shit... FULL SCALE, BIGGEST SHOW ON EARTH... the LIVE EXECUTION OF AMERICAN DOMESTIC ENEMIES.

but the girl gets two slips, the bill for the bullets used to kill her parents. then will see what she can keeps... nothing more than george flyod ever had. It seems fair, she lives, she can change name and start a new life... or she wants to play like dead daddy and mommy?
and now the tick tock programs, those who should arrest him and her NOW, are next in line for the execution... when will the cutting time be? more kills... I like that...
but before execution, DATA Extractions... all will be known...

I am curious at which speed the most recent mind reading devices can extract a life of corruption and crimes...

was nancy a sex toy of the "kennedy who cheated in chirak"?
and the little boy of the state of virgina (200+ millions) wanted to take our ARs? his assets will be used to pay a little bit of the debt of this state... money recovery program, active.

if could find the speech transcript of pedotrump before congress that she torn appart,.. that's one what the bill for their executions will be quickly written on it... and send to the daughter... funny isn't it?
I am curious what will be the price, no gov over pricing... market price...
yeah yeah... try not to fracture your bones female...
